channel.title: Installation of Black Mesa
channel.description: I have installed Black Mesa but went starting the program, I receive the following warning message ''Engine Error'' ''Could not load library Client''. Any advice as to what is causing this would be appreciated.

item.title: Installation of Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
try to force it to run in windowed mode without intro by adding -window -novid in the shortcut target textbox

Read full topic

try steam://install/218 & steam://run/218

I starting your commands so only triggered: Source SDK base 2007. Black Mesa Mod does not start it

Cpl.1nsane:

Has it been installed to “C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\SourceMods\BMS” ?

YES! The problem running continues

item.title: Installation of Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: encore
item.description:
CPU:

Do you have Source SDK Base 2007 installed?
If not, download it through Steam under Library>Tools.

Oh yes. I have been through the steam SDK Base 2007 installed rapidly. But this does not solve the my problem : (

Last night I downloaded the mod: Black Mesa

https://www.blackmesasource.com

Everything I did for proper startup and operation of the game:

How to play:

Game: Black Mesa install into your STEAM folder usuall it looks like this:

"C: \ Program Files (x86) \ Steam \

You will also need: Source SDK Base 2007, Which Also install.

Farther, you must restart your steam and run it again.

Then it Would Be in your games library installed should see the availability of Black Mesa and now you can run

I do not know why it does not work.
I run the game through steam loading splash screen before the main menu. The game completely crashes. Game will crash and show up on the desktop. The error message: ENGINE ERROR - Could not client library

Can you please help to solve the problem?

Read full topic

item.title: Installation of Black Mesa

Do you have Source SDK Base 2007 installed?
If not, download it through Steam under Library>Tools.
